name: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
description: Madea, Bam, and Hattie venture to a haunted campground and the group must run for their lives when monsters, goblins, and the boogeyman are unleashed.

review.author: thebenstrong
review.heading: Eh
review.reviewBody: It's alright if you're looking for something mindless to watch. If Madea and Bam could be a bigger focus, that's be great. If Tyler Perry didn't appear as himself, that'd be great. If they could get some decent actors, that'd be great.

keywords: sequel,second part,directed by star,rhyme in title,birthday
